component.text: A digital multimeter is used to test the integrity of circuits and the quality of electricity in computer components.
A loopback adapter is used to test the basic functionality of computer ports.
A tone generator and probe is used to trace cables.

An external enclosure houses a hard drive that can be used to diagnose a customer hard drive or a computer that does not boot. The external enclosure can also be used to create backups of a customer's hard drive.
